kDesc
Football. Live it, breath it, now wear it. Get the PUMA-sponsored Africa Unity shirt. [#Legal]
Le football. Vivez-le, respirez-le et portez-le ! Obtenez le maillot Africa Unity sponsorisé par PUMA. [#Legal]
Fußball leben, atmen und jetzt auch tragen. Sichern Sie sich das von PUMA gesponserte „Africa Unity“-Trikot. [#Legal]
Calcio: lo vivi, lo respiri... e lo indossi! Per te la maglia Africa Unity, firmata PUMA. [#Legal]
Fútbol. Vívelo. Respíralo. Y ahora, llévalo puesto. Viste la camiseta Africa Unity, patrocinada por PUMA. [#Legal]
Football. Live it, breath it, now wear it. PUMA®がスポンサーのAfrica UnityＴシャツをゲットしよう！ [#Legal]
모두가 즐기고 사랑하는 축구. 이제는 입을 차례입니다. PUMA의 스폰서를 받는 아프리카 유니티의 홈 티셔츠를 입으십시오. [#Legal]
Football. Live it, breath it, now wear it. Get the PUMA-sponsored Africa Unity shirt. [#Legal]
